description:
Sad that no one notices her, the Ghost Girl has decided to move on.  And then, the platoon put Giroro to sleep and gives him dreams about Natsumi so that he won`t notice the real her is in trouble from the platoon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Spirit-chan, I`ll Rest in Peace / Giroro, Even After Dreaming Time
幽霊ちゃん 私 成仏します であります / ギロロ 夢見る頃を過ぎても であります
